setScrollPane

public void setScrollPane(javax.swing.JScrollPane scrollPane)
Only used for a workaround on Mac Java 1.4.2, which causes the scrollpane to lose focus after a new layout of this panel. If scrollPane is not null, a requestFocusOnWindow will be called after each new layout
